name: Python Dev Container
postCreateCommand: sudo apt update -y && sudo apt install -y vim && sudo apt install -y ca-certificates curl gnupg && sudo mkdir -p /etc/apt/keyrings && sudo curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/gpgkey/nodesource-repo.gpg.key | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/nodesource.gpg && NODE_MAJOR=20 && sudo echo deb [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/nodesource.gpg] https:\/\/deb.nodesource.com\/node_$NODE_MAJOR.x nodistro main | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/nodesource.list && sudo apt update -y && sudo apt install -y nodejs && sudo cp ./.devcontainer/openvpn-configs/resolv.conf /etc/resolv.conf && sudo openvpn --config $OPENVPN_CONFIG --auth-user-pass /etc/openvpn/auth.txt --daemon
